channel.title: Sports Nuts on Daniel Kerwin
channel.description: Recent content in Sports Nuts on Daniel Kerwin

item.title: Link to my blogs
item.description:
I keep two main blogs, “Sports Nuts”, which grew out of a sports talk radio program I hosted on Macalester College radio, and “Chill Time with DK”, which is a forum for more open-ended subject matter.
You can find descriptions of each blog below.

Sports Nuts

Description: The world is, always has been, and always will be filled with sports. But why do sports matter? Well, that’s pretty much what I’ll be trying to answer through my posts. This blog takes a deep look at the sporting world, looking below the surface at the greater meaning of sports and sporting culture. Enjoy!

http://dksportsnuts.blogspot.com/

Chill Time with DK

Description: A blog allowing its writer and its readers to just take some time to chill out. No limitation on topics - true inspiration can’t be constrained within predefined boundaries…

http://chilltimewithdk.blogspot.com/
